function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of understanding of system drivers and disturbances","Impact":"Inadequate response to disease outbreaks and other disturbances in the environment","Mitigation":"Conduct thorough analysis and monitoring of system drivers and disturbances, implement early warning systems","Technologies":"Environmental monitoring systems, data analytics tools","People":"Researchers, policymakers, public health officials","Owner":"Research institutions, government agencies, public health organizations"},{"Description":"Inadequate buffer capacity for change in the system","Impact":"Inability to cope with sudden changes such as disease outbreaks, leading to system collapse","Mitigation":"Build greater capacity for change and flexibility into the system, diversify resources and livelihood strategies","Technologies":"Resource management tools, community resilience planning","People":"Communities, resource managers, social organizations","Owner":"Community leaders, local authorities, resilience organizations"},{"Description":"Lack of internal and external resilience policies","Impact":"Inability to respond effectively to disruptions and recover from them, leading to prolonged impact on society and infrastructure","Mitigation":"Develop and implement robust internal and external resilience policies, conduct regular drills and simulations","Technologies":"Resilience policy frameworks, simulation software, communication platforms","People":"Management teams, infrastructure operators, emergency response teams","Owner":"Organizational leaders, infrastructure operators, government agencies"}]}
